DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether rasburicase effective safety correct hyperuricemia .
DOC.criteria: List inclusion Criteria : Acute hyperuricemia patient ( uric acid > 8.0 mg/dl ) before/during chemotherapy hematologic malignancy . List exclusion Criteria : Hypersensitivity uricases excipients . Known history hemolytic anemia ( G6PD deficiency ) . The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
